IP = 128.1.6.5/12
Classe = B
10000000.00000001.00000110.00000101
CIDR = 12
Host = 1.6.5
Subnet Mask = 255.240.0.0
// 11111111.11110000.00000000.00000000
11111111.1111 // Bloccati i primi 12 bit
Ip Network = 1.0.0.0
// 10000000.00000001.00000110.00000101
// 11111111.11110000.00000000.00000000
// 10000000.00000000.00000000.00000000 = 128.0.0.0

Numeri di Host disponibili = 
256 – 240 = 16 
16 * 256 * 256 = 1048576 – 2 = 1048574
